artist: Artist: Itō Shinsui; Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga); head and torso of woman reflected in mirror at R; woman wears grey, purple, white and dark pink striped kimono with black collar and inner blue floral color
markings: red artist\'s seal: 深水 {Shinsui} | on back, red seal: 貮百枚限り絶版　第壱八七番 {nihyaku mai kagiri zeppan, dai hyakuhachijūnana ban} (limited edition of 200, number 187)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Black Neckband
